entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.2°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 69 %

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
